title: Full-time Research and Teaching Position in Film Studies
job_description:
The candidate will be required to coordinate the organization and pedagogical supervision of a number of courses and/or the Master Â« Arts du spectacle Â»,, in dialogue with all of the professors involved (supervision of exercises, correction of exams, organization of correction and feedback sessions, pedagogical follow-up of the preparatory work for the dissertation, assistance in the organization of conferences). More generally, he/she will assist the (vice)president in the organizational implementation of the Master program. Certain logistical tasks (such as participating in the supervision of written exams) may also be assigned as part of this mandate. The total load of pedagogical and logistical assistance will be a maximum of 900 hours, including a maximum of 300 hours of presence in front of the students. 

The objective of the mandate being to conduct and finalize a doctoral thesis, the tasks will be equally divided between 'Teaching' and 'Research' for a volume of 0.50 FTE for each of the two components of the mandate.

Main Research Field : ARTS

Required educational level: Master level in film studies
